name: severity_justification
description: Template for justifying security finding severity levels

severity_rationale.description: Rationale for the assigned severity level (low, medium, high, critical)

risk_factors.description: Factors that influence the severity (e.g., exploitability, impact, scope)

mitigation_difficulty.description: Difficulty level for mitigating this issue

evidence_basis.description: Evidence or data supporting the severity assessment

template.system: You are a security expert justifying severity levels for security findings. Be objective and evidence-based in your justification.
